title: World Century Compendium to TCM, Vol. 3: Introduction to Chinese Materia Medica
cleaned_text: No hay productos en el carrito World Century Compendium to TCM, Vol. 3: Introduction to Chinese Materia Medica Yang, J. — Huang, H. — Zhu, L. — Chen, Y. 1ª Edición Noviembre 2013 Inglés Tapa blanda 576 pags 800 gr 17 x 24 x 3 cm ISBN 9781938134166 Editorial WORLD SCIENTIFIC LIBRO IMPRESO 82,45 €78,33 €IVA incluido Recíbelo en un plazo De 2 a 3 semanas First Week Second Week: - Medicinals that Release Exterior - Acrid-Cool Third Week: - Medicinals that Clear Heat Retention Medicinals that Warm the Seventh that Qi Week: - Medicinals that Calm the Spirit - that Calm the Liver and Extinguish Wind Twelfth Medicinals provide readers with adequate knowledge for clinical application of Chinese medicine, which is in line with the fundamental principle of "correspondence of Chinese medicinals and help readers effectively grasp the concepts behind practical applications, and are designed to easily retaining the information.
